name: Project Crimson
description:
Project Crimson is a 2D action-arcade clicker where your movement is restricted to a straight line in front of you. Use objects scattered throughout the arena to manipulate your movement and, with some luck and good timing, fly through 75 levels of fun and satisfying challenges where your reaction time will be tested. No advertisements, no microtransactions.

  • 75 Levels Of Satisfying Obstacles
  • Earn Achievements By Achieving Optional Score Goals on Each Level
  • Customize Your Avatar with Unlockable Colors
  • Planned Free Update to Include an Endless Mode

Be warned, this game is capital 'H' Hard. Capital 'A,' 'R,' and 'D' too. HARD. The game's HARD, is what I'm trying to say.
